projects.title: About You
projects.desc: A flutter application that tells what data is collected by Google, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. Also includes features like locate your mobile, live demo of how website track us.

projects.title: FinTracker
projects.desc: FinTracker is an expense tracker application built with Flutter to help you effortlessly manage your finances. It has a user-friendly interface to enter and categorize your expenses, and helps you gain insights of your spending habits thereby helping you stay within your budget.

projects.title: Sudoku Master
projects.desc: A flutter application to play sudoku game.

projects.title: BMI Calculator
projects.desc: A flutter application with beautiful UI that calculates BMI based on weight and height input.

projects.title: Virtual Keyboard
projects.desc: A keyboard that works by detecting hand movement and image processing, acts as an alternative for the traditional keyboard
